---
title: Statistics for sagepoint-node `r Sys.time()` 
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(warning = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(message = FALSE)
knitr::opts_chunk$set(cache = FALSE)

library(ggplot2)

rd <- read.csv("/home/bosr/R_HOME/sagepoint.csv")
rd$Rewards <- rd$Rewards / 1e9
rd$Date <- as.Date(rd$Time)


rewards <- ggplot(rd, aes(Date, Rewards, group = 1)) + 
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Outstanding Rewards in TCRO")

height <- ggplot(rd, aes(Date, Height, group = 1)) + 
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Block Height")

power <- ggplot(rd, aes(Date, Power, group = 1)) + 
  geom_line() +
  labs(title = "Voting Power")
```

```{r}
print(rewards)

print(height)

print(power)

print(sample(5))

```
